
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std ;

int main(){
	
	string  code []  = {"ABC","DEF","GHI","JKL","MNO","PQRS","TUV","WXYZ"} ;

	int T , i , j;

	string in ;
	string ans ;
	
	scanf("%d",&T) ;
	
	char c ;
	char n ;

	while(T--){
	
		cin >> in ;
		i = 0 ;
		ans = "" ;
		
		while(i<in.length()){
			
			c = in[i] ;
			n = in[i] ;
			
			if(c == '#'){
			
				i++ ;
				continue ;

			}
			if(c == '0'){
			
				ans+=' ' ;
				i++ ;
				continue ;
			}

			j = i ;
			while(n!='#' && n==c && j<in.length()){
				j++ ;
				if(j>=in.length())
					break ;
				n = in[j] ;	
			}


			ans+=code[c-48-2][j-i-1] ;

			i = j ;
		
		}
		
		cout << ans << endl ;
	
	}
}
